website_summaries.verdict: Once you get beyond the inflation learning curve, you'll find yourself with a comfortable and sturdy lounger.
pros: Lightweight and portable with a storage bag
Has built-in pockets, as well as a stake and tether so it doesn't fly away
Available in a variety of colors
cons: The inflation system can take some time to master

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Comfortable Lounger
customer_reviews.text: Saw these on Facebook and advertised everywhere so I decided to try one. It took some time getting used to getting it filled with air but once you know that it doesn't have to be completely full of air it is pretty easy to use. Once you get enough air in it, rolling the end will make it fuller. It is quite comfortable, depending on if you like it firm or not you can loosen it by unrolling the end. It has pockets on the side and comes with a stake if you want to keep it tied down. I would recommend this product. If you found this review helpful please click yes.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome and so comfy but it deflated quickly. I am hoping there it is simply a hole or defect because I really think I would enjoy it if it stayed inflated for more than 10 minutes. Update: The company sent me a new one without any hassle of returning the defective one. I appreciate their amazing customer service and I love the product. It stays inflated and is way more comfortable than I imagined it would be.
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and sooo comfy. Lightweight, sand doesn't stick and you can float in the water. They can fly away so attach to something if it's windy. Best beach 'chairs' by far due to comfort and easy of packing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W

customer_reviews.title: Great Lounger. I should have bought this a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Lounger. I should have bought this a long time ago. It’s so comfy and easy to inflate. Perfect to bring to the park/ beach. Small, light and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Emely Leticia Aparecida Pires

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!!! I take it everywhere and leave it in my car for any occasion. When it is a windy day it inflated with no problem. Sometimes when camping I have had to fill it with my hair drier to make it really full. If the wind is not enough you just roll roll roll the clip down and it will fill up more but just get shorter like a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim311

customer_reviews.title: best Air Lounge
customer_reviews.text: I normaly not writting review but this product really amazed me. Not only is the Product prefect and the best Air lounge that i have (and i tried severals) Also the costumer support is great, they helped me out when my package didnt arrived in time and gave me a immediatly refund when the Postoffice lost it. To the product: The manufacture is really good and high quality and even after several beach weeks every thing works great ( not like other air lounges where the closing metal straps arent bending right anymore) I can only recommend wekapo if youre looking for a good air lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never been more comfortable laying on a beach in my life. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these air loungers for a concert and I easily got 50 compliments. People were so jealous of how comfortable we looked and felt. I then packed my two air loungers for a trip to Puerto Rico they fit easily in side my carry-on. When I got to the beach they blew up within five seconds and I was comfortable for hours. They are waterproof and I’ve never been more comfortable laying on a beach in my life. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Seriously, buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse purchase for me, and I regret nothing! I've used this several times now, but this past weekend I took it to a football watch party/camp out and it stayed fully inflated the ENTIRE weekend! My little cousins were using it to jump on and drag eachother around on too! I know what they will be getting from me for Christmas now..
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this product is incredible. Easy to inflate if you follow the directions, and man is it COMFORTABLE. I mean, really really comfortable. Unfortunately one of the plastic rods on ours got broken somehow. We contacted Wekapo and they immediately sent us a new one, no questions asked. Their customer service is top notch. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hockman

customer_reviews.title: but this chair is wonderful. I have used it all over
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a small person, and I wasn't sure how it would hold me, but this chair is wonderful. I have used it all over! I took it camping, I took it to the beach, I even sometimes blow it up and use it in my living room while watching TV. The hardest part is getting out of it gracefully! :)
customer_reviews.author: Limoncello

customer_reviews.title: I have heard it was hard to inflate but it seemed easy for me
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these air lounger a few years ago for about $75-100, but now they are a lot more affordable. I've always wanted one so I finally bought one. I have heard it was hard to inflate but it seemed easy for me. I almost got it inflated running in my kitchen but needed just a little more room. Went outside and inflated easily. Sat on it and I really like it. Definitely going to take this to all outdoor events. Comes with stake and clip and you'll need it if it's windy outside cause it's light
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered 4 different inflatable lounger and this is my favorite. Like all of them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 different inflatable lounger and this is my favorite. Like all of them, it's a little difficult to inflate using air so we used a fan. It's big and cozy. You sink right in and the sides hug you, it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product can vouch for this 1 for sure
customer_reviews.text: Great product can vouch for this 1 for sure. Currently long term camping this scoop air couch has not really needed refilling like my other inflatables do it has been anchored in same spot for 2 weeks now. Kudos WEKAPO on that note. Also apparently had a small ember from fire find it's way almost inside couch melted a small circle on outer cover no damage to inner baggie that holds air impresses to say the least although it will be a sad day when the weak spot goes.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to keep it from blowing away on the beach. Also it is really hard to get it dry if you get any moisture on it and then the whole thing molds. We used it twice and then it was worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Glad I waited to leave my review.
customer_reviews.text: After the fifth use it busted. Would not recommend. I bought this instead of a nylon hammock and will now purchase the hammock. There are a lot of reviews that mention “I used at the beach it worked great!” The reviews that mention breaking after multiple uses should be believed more. This broke after the fifth use. Also, you look like an absolute idiot inflating this thing, ESPECIALLY if you aren’t running in a completely flat surface. I was NEVER able to fill it in my own without falling on my face (thank god its been on sand and soft grass). Waste of $$ and earth resources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This product may look like a really cool lounger for outside but it is anything but what it is advertised as. Inflating this huge thing is near impossible with following the instructions (every way they have listed). It is a huge waste of money, energy, and time to buy this. I was extremely disappointed. It is essentially an inflatable coffin that you sink into a small slit between the inflated sides, while the pillow is high up. This is horrible for your back and neck and is not comfortable whatsoever. I spent nearly an hour trying to inflate this but within seconds it loses puff. I strongly regret buying this POS. The pictures are also very misleading for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy to blow up and not worth the work
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if mine was defective but we tried everything and could not blow it up. We had several ppl trying to help and we had to do without. Not that easy to blow up and not worth the work
customer_reviews.author: Nila Yousufi

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Doesn’t inflate even when following instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed in this purchase, I gifted this to my fiancé on our first camping trip together excited for her to be able to relax and enjoy the camp but after 30 minutes of me running around and swinging this thing around I gave up. They really need to just make it able to be sealed and inflated my blowing into it either by mouth or air pump or whatever. I Do not recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bobberwulf Fishing

customer_reviews.title: It takes skill to make it work!
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't get it to work right! I can only get it to inflate halfway so the floor section was not inflated at all! I know two others who purchased this. One said she can only make a "love seat" out of it. The other said he loves it. So one out of two.
customer_reviews.author: SashaG.

customer_reviews.title: I don't get it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes no sense whatsoever. Two people cant sit on it, one person can sit across it fairly well but no back support or comfort; it makes no sense as a float for one since the sides envelop you too high to have a breeze cool you or to comfortably read a book. It was past my return date before we tried to use it, so past my return date. I'm tossing it since it's worthless and taking up space! Don't waste your time on this design.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: This is Great!
customer_reviews.text: My Niece got the similar lounge chair from another brand at a similar price that deflated. She tried to get a replacement, but the company declined. This was not Amazon purchase. I felt so sorry for her, I got this and thinking that I should be able to get replacement if anything happens. We inflated, tossed it around all over the place, in & out, and it is sturdy as ever. She loves the little pockets and the head placement. She was so happy and I was able to, again, confirm that most of the items purchased through Amazon are GREAT and reviews do tell the truth
customer_reviews.author: Stella Pak

customer_reviews.title: HAHaHA No Good BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I purchased this product, I thought it would be a great addition to my family's beach trips. since we spend long hours at the beach I thought it would be something to relax on and maybe for the kids to sleep on if need be. Point is: it would have to be extremely Windy out to actually work maybe if you live in a very windy area this would work. Anywho I Returned immediately. Pro: I had a laugh running around in my back yard trying to catch the wind looking like a complete idiot Hahaha No Good Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Three minute inflate.  Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! This product impressed me from the moment I opened the nice ziploc packaging and found the Manual (well, it’s one pager (hurray)). Thank you for making this inflatable by natural means- which means no air pump needed. I’m a not a young woman and It took me less than three minutes to get the lounger out of its tote, unrolled, and inflated. The Manual describes all aspects exactly as they are and provides relevant suggestions. Yes, I will be purchasing another one. High quality. Innovative. Honest.
customer_reviews.author: Analia Flores

customer_reviews.title: Excellent make shift couch.
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak for outdoor capabilities since I got this after it got cold but I have used it occasionally indoors for movie marathons. Personally it doesn't stay 100% inflated if I'm using it for a while but it doesn't deflate to the point where I'm touching the ground which is good enough for me. I'm able to get it pretty filled in my boyfriend's living room which is about a medium-sized space but this probably wouldn't work well in an apartment or setting where you can't flail the heck out of it. It's really hard to repack into the bag it came in for me but it fits well into a regular backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Average Jill

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COZY AND EASY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and super comfy! I used it at the Sundown Music Festival and was super cozy listening to the music! They are easy to carry, super easy to inflate (and you DONT need an air compressor to fill up which I mistakenly bought because I didn’t realize you just scoop air into them which is super cool!), and super easy to uninflate and put away. I highly recommend this product and am super happy with it:) I am also very impressed with their customer service and emails to check in and make sure I was happy with my purchase which I totally am🤗 Thanks for a great product WEKAPO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davis

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, very comfortable, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for all these inflatable products. Ended up ordering 6 of these. We used them immediately on a camping trip. We slept in them in the open air all night. Very comfortable. No neck or back discomfort the next day. Floated in a shallow creek in them. No problems brushing over stream rocks. The kids inflated and deflated over and over and over. They flopped all over them and stacked them three high with a kid in each one. The durability is amazing!!! And customer service was very quick with a response to my inquiry! I am planning to buy more over the holidays for other family. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, getting more!
customer_reviews.text: Sad I didn't buy this sooner! I love it. And while it's hilarious watching someone run to try to fill it, it's not only ineffective but unnecessary. Once you get the hang of the proper air-filling technique, it's actually pretty easy and even if it's not completely full of air you just keep rolling it to make it more firm. Pretty much fail proof. It's actually fairly comfortable and kind of hugs you. A little tricky with 2 people but where there's a will there's a way :). Comes with a carrying bag and stake so it can't fly away, definitely a mist have for festivals and park going in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Summerdazed728

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my great granddaughter (4) and today we attempted to set it up in her room. Just to play as we understand it's not to sleep on for more than 3 to 4 hours. Anyway, it's too difficult to inflate. I literally ran around the backyard (big joke) trying to get some air. We ended up using the compressor. Took too long and still wasn't truly inflated. There is no way we would be able to take it camping. I am so sorry. Just need to work on the inflation method. BTW my great granddaughter wants us to give it back. Her words.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin18

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This lounger is BEAUTIFUL and SUPER COMFORTABLE! I originally bought it for an out door movie night and it worked great in the grass as well as the beach. When I take it to the beach I get some many complaments on how cool it looks and how comfortable I look lounging in it. I've never owned one and I still have trouble getting it inflated with there being a little wind. Because there are 2 chambers instead of just 1 I think this is why it takes some time to inflate. Once inflated it does last about a good 2-2 1/2 hours with needing a little more air. I would definitely purchase this again for myself and for gifts
customer_reviews.author: N'Sean La Tour

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to inflate if it's not a windy day
customer_reviews.text: I certainly don't regret the purchase, because it's lightweight and I can carry it to the park, have a nice long walk and then reward myself with a lie-down under a tree. But (and I'm not a kid, so maybe if I was 20 or 30 it would be easier), running around trying to inflate it when it isn't windy isn't so easy. And I feel like an idiot. So I end up giving up and it's kinda half inflated and my butt is on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: WorldlyGifts

customer_reviews.title: Fabric unravels and Didn’t reimburse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these and at first use thought they might be great but after 3 uses fabric began to unravel. Was allowed to return items and they paid me for 1 and not the other. Paid for two, have none, reimbursed for 1. Will never purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Good luck trying to fill it up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenage son after reading a recommendation. The idea seemed cool; a personal inflatable couch for him to use while gaming. We spent half an hour Christmas morning trying to figure out how to get air in this. Should come with a pump! The instructions actually recommend using a leaf blower. Better fit for outdoor camping or if you have room to run and fill it up. I felt so bad, I bought my son another gift to replace this letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a problem with inflating
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My biggest concern was whether I could inflate it with enough pressure by just running with it. But it turns out that the actual pressure is not dependent on how much air you get into it. The amount of air actually just determines the eventual length of the inflatable sofa. This is because you roll it up to the desired pressure. So it is as inflated as you want it to be. The more air you get in, the less you roll up the one end of it. So far durability looks good and I was even able to float on it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Drinker

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite recent purchases!
customer_reviews.text: We love this air couch and even got another one so we could have one and our kids could have the other one. They're easy to pack, very comfy to lay on, and the kids LOVE playing on them, which can be a nice way to occupy them at the park (and even get exercise!). We get so many questions and admiring comments when we use them. Easiest to inflate in windy weather, but doable without wind with a bit of effort. AND they float in water, which is an extra bonus. I'm even planning on putting them in the basement for the kids this winter for something to play on. One of our favorite recent purchases!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not necessarily for overnight sleep. Still a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in the pool, that has not arrived yet. So while we are looking forward to trying that out, my husband and kids decided to tent out in the backyard. The perfect opportunity to test it out. While it was comfortable for him for a few hours, the entire night was too long to stay comfortable. The kids all love it and sometimes they even disappear into it and has made it a great and comfortable place for hide and seek. Overall we love it and every member of the family enjoys it. It seems pretty durable with all the use/abuse it's been getting by our 4 kids. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far! Good quality! Hasn’t popped or deflated yet on me!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it hasn’t popped yet, like many I have purchased. A couple even came popped or deflate very quickly. So far this one I have had absolutely no problem with and very easy to fill up. Just takes a little practice. Don’t get discouraged. My best advise is to have a taller person fill it for you. I’m 5’1” and it’s fairly long and hard for me to get it in the air to fill but I can still make it happen if I don’t have a tall person around. Love the Being green color and the clip that comes with it to crack a beer with.
customer_reviews.author: Monishegone

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to inflate with air outside- must use an air pump
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Excellent customer service! My purchase was defective. They sent me a new one. If you have any problems at all, contact their customer service. The video makes it look as if you can inflate this lounger with the air outside. I ran around in circles like an idiot and it was barely inflated and yes, it was a windy day. I finally used our electric air pump and it inflated beautifully. It is comfortable and will be nice the next time we go camping but might want to inflate if from your car before heading to your campsite. and
customer_reviews.author: laura sp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable & easy to inflate. It isn't as nice as I expected for the price. The rip stop fabric seems nice, but the liner is basically a bag made out of the same material as a plastic painter's tarp. It's functional, but for $50 I expected it to be a bit more than a nylon bag with an overgrown trash bag inside. It is a bit top heavy if not staked down & is difficult to get in and out of. I'm pretty athletic and balanced, but I still had trouble getting in and out of this thing with any semblance of grace. It's extremely comfortable once you do manage to get in it though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Uodated! The best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: Update! The owner has the best customer service I've had in the entire 49 years of my life. While I couldn't figure this out does not make it a bad product at all but the level of customer service I received was just amazing. After it was all said and done I received a follow up card in the mail. Just amazing! 5 stars for customer service alone.
customer_reviews.author: tammie brown adams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE----- Wekapo contacted me and offered to send me a new inflatable lounge, free of charge or any inconvenience to me. I received it and tried it out immediately. It definitely holds air longer than the other one. I am so impressed by their wonderful customer service. They really go above and beyond. I can't recommend this company highly enough. I really love this lounger, but it’s pretty disappointing that it deflates after a couple hours. Is this normal? Anyone else find that this is how it works? If it would stay inflated longer, I’d give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Home School Mama

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and portable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and very portable. We have used it at the park, on a camping trip and at the beach. If there is a breeze and I run, inflation is pretty easy. Otherwise I have struggled to get it inflated easily. O doubt I have provided entertainment to others as I run and swoop to get the air in. It is easy enough to get it back into the bag. The hardest part of fitting the end with the buckle back in. Overall I really enjoy how comfortable it is to lounge in and how easy it is to bring with me. I’m sure I’ll get better at filling it the more I practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Cool but I won't be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Cozy by the fire :) 2. Comfy for a quick nap 3. Very easy to pack up- it won't take up much space in the car. Cons 1. Hard to inflate- I had to use an air mattress pump. You're not able to run and fill this thing. 2. Easily deflates- You get about 1-2 hours of use before refilling which might be ok for some. 3. Difficult to get into and out of. Someone is going to laugh at you... 4. Side pocket stretched out after holding 1 beer. 5. In retrospect, it's a bit overpriced for what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend camping without one-- it's officially an essential item, in our book!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was a slam dunk! I bought one for my coworker for her birthday, and she reported back that it was her new favorite thing! She said she and her husband fought over who got to lay in it, so when I decided to get one for my husband's birthday, I got two! We camp once a month (year round), and often unassemble and reassemble the backyard hammock on trips. These fit into tiny packs we can store in our trailer, they're SO COMFORTABLE-- like adult newborn comfortable-- easy to set up and break down, waterproof, pop resistant, and the drink holder, pockets, and pillow are features I really appreciate! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I live in apartment that’s basically ground level. I purchased this with the intent of setting up a little reading nook (while also using it to insulate that particular wall a little better). I could not be happier with my decision. It’s comfy and added a nice pop of color to my bedroom. I used an oscillating fan to fill it up and it worked great. My 8 year old daughter has already fallen asleep on it while reading so I guess it’s a win/win 😆. It seems durable and is lined with clear plastic so there’s added protection against the elements, should I ever use it for it it’s intended purposes outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service. Amazingly comfortable chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely floored by three amazing customer service for these air chairs. Our lounger ripped at the pocket, but still inflated fine. I reported the rip to the company and within minutes had a response from the actual owner of the company saying they would send out a new one right then. I'm so impressed. I've never had that kind of customer service, and on a Saturday too! These chairs are insanely comfortable and I absolutely love ours. Thank you for developing such an innovative product and for being a great company to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mo

customer_reviews.title: Inflated and doesnt hold air longer than 10 minutes. Leaks around the pillow seam.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems awesome, however mine is leaking around the pillow portion. I would give it 5 stars if it didnt deflate after 10 minutes. I would change my rating to 5 star if incan send this one back and get a new one that doesnt leak.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I DONT LIKE SURPRISES IF IM PAYING
customer_reviews.text: The product is and has always been quality. My gripe isn’t about product quality, it’s about the poor attention to detail and lack of aptitude to ensure the consumer (especially in these times) are getting exactly what they pay for. I ordered an orange wekapo and they gave me a pink one? TF!? Thanks to their lack of attention to detail, I couldn’t enjoy it and worst of all was a total disappointment for my daughters birthday (for which I bought it for).
customer_reviews.author: crossedxanchors

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! I ordered one for my son and me for lounging in the backyard or the beach. It was a little tricky to blow up without a lot of wind in the backyard, so I used a fan from a small bouncy house. Once it was filled it was SO comfortable and relaxing! It was even better than I expected it to be. Very easy to roll and secure once filled. The material seems very sturdy and I'm not worried about popping it!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: I Tried it & Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Wondered if this inflatable lounger lived up to all the hype.. and it Did!!! I used it for camping and just Had to try it in water. It took less than a minute to set up at the beach because of the wind..a bit more difficult without wind btw, and take down was super easy, just press out the air. I think it’s Excellent!! As soon as you lie in it, you really feel comfortable & want to nap! Also tried it with 2 people as a seat & it held air with approx 375lbs! I ended up buying another for my bf so we could Both lounge around (without sharing ;D. This item is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: saz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and I. This air hammock is actually pretty awesome! It takes some time to inflate- especially if it’s not windy... but it’s pretty comfortable. It’s very portable which makes me love it even more. My dogs are obsessed with it too!! Mine looses air as it’s laid in, but it’s a great lounger. We haven’t tried my husbands yet- so I don’t know if that’s typical or not. I’ve used it a few times this past year, camping and lounging in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: S&J

customer_reviews.title: Best pandemic purchase! Love my Wekapo.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase I have made during this pandemic. It is incredibly easy to inflate and just as easy to deflate. I can tell you firsthand that this is far better than other loungers in terms of quality. My friend has one that she purchased a few years ago ( not a wekapo) and the mouth on her lounger is smaller and can’t catch enough air. Once it’s inflated it loses air rapidly. We ended up spending the day on my lounger together! Which just goes to show that this one is incredibly sturdy! I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bright red lounger and loved it! I tried filling it up with air as if I were trying to lift a kite off the ground but found 2 things: 1. Using a blow dryer to fill up each side of the chamber was most successful. 2. Once I filled the chambers, I realized I didn't need that much air in them to make the lounger sturdy and comfy. So filling it like a kite would likely have been ample. Can't wait to use it again. It was extremely comfortable - can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: NATPAN

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old is very hard on his belongings. When he wanted to order this, I didn't expect it to last long. Yet, it has lasted! It's easy to inflate and comfy to lie in. There are convenient side pockets to hold stuff. You can stuff it into a small sack when it is not in use, but my kids just leave it inflated all the time. For a while, they were launching themselves onto it from a swing in our backyard (don't try this at home), and now it is doubling as a punching bag. I keep expecting it to burst a seam, but it just keeps on going. I'm very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bangor

customer_reviews.title: Best nap ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. It’s fun to fill up although not always easy. Took us 3 tries to get it full-ish. But once the end was rolled up and secured, it was so comfortable that I fell asleep! I didn’t want to invest in really fancy deck furniture for our rental apartment patio. This fit the bill perfectly. Stores easily and doesn’t take up any space. We can take it to the park and amuse people as we run with it behind us. That’s how I first saw it and it looked like fun. On my way to ordering another so my husband and I can each have our own .
customer_reviews.author: Wantmyowndrone

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for camping/festivals
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this twice now but I love it. Easily fits one person laying down or 3 sitting side by side. Haven't personally inflated it because it's hilarious and fun to watch it be inflated, but as long as you follow directions the process doesn't appear to be too tricky. It's been used on bare ground (grassy/sandy with some small ish pebbles) both times I've used it and so far has stood up well. Also can't count the number of times I've been asked where I got it lol. Worth the money, soooo so comfy for a normal camping trip or relaxing in down time at a music fest.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2. We needed a small device to pack in a motorcycle. They were perfect! It took a while to get them inflated at first but once you get it, peace of cake! Unfortunately one of them was defective and wouldn’t hold. The other one worked great. Instead of returning it, I followed the instructions that came on a Warranty Card. I got an immediate response from Penny and a brand new is on the way. Didn’t even have to return the origonal one. Customer service at its best ! The only thing I would change is the material. It gets hot. So we used light blankets and that worked. Hopefully they’ll research and improve that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Hard to inflate, didn’t keep air.
customer_reviews.text: Watched the videos, tried all the methods. Had a terrible time getting this thing blown up. Then when I finally did, it was uncomfortable and deflated quickly. Now sits in a pile in my living room. Gave 2 stars in case it’s user error but I don’t think that’s it...
customer_reviews.author: KDF

customer_reviews.title: Works, ish
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the idea of this product.. I purchased it for a weekend camping trip on the river, in a valley. There was absolutely no wind available that weekend and my couch was more like a sad deflated balloon. We tried multiple times, to no avail, to get this thing inflated. We managed to get juuuuust enough air in it to make it work and with it rolled super tight (decreasing the size) it was inflated enough to sit in, and was pretty comfortable. I will try again at a more windy date and update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jean Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Portable comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I was going backpacking and wanted a lightweight option for lounging at our destination. I’m SO GLAD I got this. It’s so comfortable and incredibly portable. I love that it came with the anchor. If there’s even a slight breeze, it’s super easy to get inflated. It takes a little trial and error to figure out inflating it in still air, you might look a little silly running around opening and closing the flaps, but it’s worth it. *updated We have 3 of these things now and they go everywhere with us, camping, beach days, backyard hang outs, they’re the best.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable lounger EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the most comfortable outdoor lounger I've ever sat in. Even though blowing it up looks pretty silly, once it's inflated it is AWESOME. I set it up in my backyard almost every day, and it packs up so small I can bring it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzy

customer_reviews.title: two pockets to fill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar item but it only had 1 pocket to fill with air. It wouldn't inflate to my standards. This WEKAPO is worth it. There are 2 pockets so when one is filled with air then you work on filling the other. It took my husband about 3 lifts of beach air for it to fill and close and it lasted the whole time at the beach. Someone even came up to us to find out where we purchased it. :) Sent her to amazon specifically this product. It is very comfortable and very easy to inflate/deflate. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: FDR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for Oshkosh airshow. It took a little bit to figure out but once we got it’s very easy to inflate. He used it to sleep on overnight. Highly recommend would buy again. We got a second one and it is so comfortable. I have fibromyalgia and getting comfortable it difficult. I inflated it in my dining room and promptly fell asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Slaymaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great idea! The product is very well made and extremely comfortable. The problem I had was getting it blown up. We live in the midwest where apparently there is very little wind or breeze in the summer. I took it camping but struggled to get it inflated. This would be great for someone that lives near the beach! I am disappointed, I was so excited to get this! WEKAPO customer service is amazing also, I thought I should add that, they gave me tips to help me, responded immediately, even though it was the weekend, and were so polite!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool product. I was a little worried about filling it as some reviewers seemed to have trouble but I sure didn’t. I unpacked it as soon as it arrived and filled it while in my not so large living room. Just a few sweeping steps and it was ready to test out. I lounged in it for a good half hour and was very comfortable. Hubby came home and tested it out as well. He also enjoyed it. I think we may have to buy a second Wekapo. It seems like a hardy product, is definitely easy to fill and comfortable to use. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli J Benstead

customer_reviews.title: Withstood 4 kids jumping
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn’t figure out how to inflate. But after reading instructions we got it filled quick. Took it camping and it withstood being used on the grass, dirt, rocks, twigs. Four kids ages 6-10 all loved this, they were jumping on it and all played and relaxed in it. I even laid it in and enjoyed how cozy it was. Great quality and easy to clean. It was a simple to roll up to fit in its bag. Would definitely buy more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stars2night

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing both in or outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this chair for my daughter. So far she loves it, my only concern was a small tear that I tried patching up. Needless to say after a couple of weeks I noticed that the air was no staying inflated for more than 30 minutes. I contacted the company and they quickly sent me a new chair. Overall, I have had an excellent experience with the company and I love the chair. Plan on buying more in the future for camping excursions.
customer_reviews.author: martist

customer_reviews.title: Get 2
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing. I saw someone with this chair at the beach and made them share the information. Easy to inflate if you don’t mind looking stupid for a few minutes. Easy to carry. My 2 year old thinks it’s a crib and is currently napping in it. Also floats in water and you will be the envy of everyone. It blows away easily so bring extra white claws to weight it down when you aren’t lounging in it.
customer_reviews.author: MotherGoose

customer_reviews.title: Get one!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I LOVE this thing!!!!! I bought it for laying under my easy up at the beach and it did perfect. Easy to set up when you get the hang of it. Easy to put away for next time use. I looked at other brands but I heard the customer service on this brand is really good so I went with this one. I have not had any trouble out of it at all. It’s very well made. Go ahead and get one, you will fall in love lol.
customer_reviews.author: Justin242

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy once you blow it up!
customer_reviews.text: As I've only blown it up on my deck, I've had to use a fan to get air into it because even on a 177sq ft deck, i couldn't get air just by swinging around. If you get it just right, it's great! Keep in mind that the material WILL make you sweat if you're wearing a bathing suit and you're in the sun. Rolling it up isn't super hard, but I wouldn't say it's the easiest feat. Either way, I'm glad I have these and I'm looking forward to using them in the park soon!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Krimer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach hammock!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect “hammock” for the beach! I wanted a way to lay at the beach without getting all sandy or hauling heavy equipment. Nice fabric that repels sand, dries quick, and is comfortable not too synthetic feeling. Took 2-3 tries to properly catch air but the closure is folded closed and the latches keep it from unfolding and opening. Very happy!! Have used 10 times and it’s comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L. Sockman

customer_reviews.title: Really great portable seating solution!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how quick and easy it is to set this up and break it down. Less than a minute to set up, two minutes to roll and pack. I use our box fan to fill it, which takes seconds. Our couch is on backorder due to COVID, and we have nowhere to sit and watch TV until it arrives... in two months! This was an inexpensive option to bridge the gap, and once our couch arrives, we look forward to using it camping and for concerts. Thanks for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Convenience on hand!
customer_reviews.text: The Wekapo is great! I have used it on the California Delta, in the pool, as extra seating for guests, camping, backyard get-togethers, you name it! I keep it in the trunk of my care since you never know when it will be of use. I was at my daughter's swim meet and all the seating was taken. But, not for me! I filled up my Wekapo and, Wah Lah, I had seating for me and my son! I get tons of questions every time I use it, and the kids are always wanting it to be their seat of choice!
customer_reviews.author: BioBugg

customer_reviews.title: Great product but even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for two years. it's been through trips to the beach, camping, and pools. The material is light, strong and comfortable. My body fits right inside the groove with a pillow like spot to rest my head. I get the occasional laugh from friends/family while inflating the lounger, but the compliments come shortly after. it's able to hold me at 220lbs with no problem. Recently I discovered a small hole which was enough to slowly deflate the lounger. I contacted Wekapo and they're sending me a replacement. It's comforting to know that a company is willing to stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Danman

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay full
customer_reviews.text: It's big and very comfortable. In the first few days it would stay full for the whole day...now a few days later it barely stays full for a couple of hours. The only people that use it (one at a time) is me (145 lbs) and my husband (220 lbs). It says it holds up to 500 lbs but seems like it might already have a leaking just from my 220 lbs husband using it. We only use it in a rubber flor without any sharp edges around, so if it leaks, it's from the fabric not being able to hold the air in.
customer_reviews.author: maria penteado

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't stay inflated at all
customer_reviews.text: The Wekapro inflatable lounger would not stay inflated despite careful adherence to enclosed Wekapro instructions, even for my 40 pound granddaughter to sit on it. I didn't want to deal with problems a 2nd time, so sadly...just returned it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I never used it until last night. Had to use a high speed fan to blow it up. I could think of any other way besides being outside running a 50 yard dash. I sat on it with nothing sharp on me. The air went out in about 30 minutes. I did it severe time with the same result. What a waste of $40. I am just glad I didn’t buys two of them.
customer_reviews.author: lediamond howard

customer_reviews.title: Slowly loses air as you sit on it
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this. Very portable. It's comfortable too. But, 6 weeks of using it and it seems to be losing air. It sounds as if there may be a leak somewhere but I can't find anything obvious and I've been careful when using it that it doesn't get damaged. I inflate it and roll it the recommended number of times but within 45 min lying on it my butt is touching the ground. I'm sad that I either got a defective one or it has not held up even 6 weeks of careful use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I used it to lay out to get my tan this summer. I am going to keep it in my trunk for anytime the kids need a place to sit when we are outdoors. I normally blow up with the air mattress blower. This is a quality item. We've had 300 pounds on it with no issues. Be careful getting off of it when you are on your back, you may flip and give everyone the giggles!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to inflate so uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a big thin material bag like item that is awkward to swing around and fill. Next to impossible to really fill. Then the comfort level is awful! I got it for daughter who goes to tons of concerts ect. We went camping with it as a seat to chill in OMG what a wacky mess! Then to think of floating it ..no way it'd be shredded if it was by any rocks or sticks!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lauritzen

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can walk fast .
customer_reviews.text: We had a great number of laughs trying to inflate this item, I should have realized it is for more flexible people than me. However, having said all of this it is a great design and definately holds air in. I finally used a window fan to inflate, but had more issues trying to sit and get out of unit. So I am not really a good judge for this item that is why 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: FxB

customer_reviews.title: Might require a teenager.....
customer_reviews.text: Have a teenager run around to inflate it. If you don't have a teenager handy, they are pretty easy to inflate (if somewhat embarrassing). However once you have it inflated, the lounger is fantastic! Super comfy, and even easy to get out of (one of my initial concerns). Worked better than the bag chairs we also brought with us to the drive in movie. I'm super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if air would stay inside.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not bad. It’s takes a lot of work to put air in when you are inflating inside the house. However, it’s comfortable when air is in it but it does not hold the air for a long time. Will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: G A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fun for any age and easy to inflate and adjust to length you want!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to inflate. It for my grandson as an overnight bed and because of the smoke and ash from the fires, we couldn’t inflate it outside, so we used the floor fans in the house circulating the cool air from the air conditioner. What a great idea for an extra bed or lounger. I was able to inflate in about 20 min and you can roll it up to your desired length to get it to be more plumped up. And the 4 year grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Way cool, too cool and comfortable, I can't get it out of my living room! Amazingly comfortable, bought it for my kid and now we take turns. I'm 50 years old which comes with normal aging type back issues and whatever... this thing is like laying on a cloud for pressure points and I love to watch TV in it. I'm 5' 10" and 210 lbs. it's plenty big for me. Don't worry about popping it, it's got a sturdy shell. Well worth the money, send help getting it out of my livng room!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good, but other brands are cheaper and exactly the same
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son recently received Amazon gift cards for their bdays. My daughter purchased this inflatable lounge and it is great! My son picked out a different brand (SEGOAL) bc of colors offered and it was $16 cheaper. They both arrived today in the exact same packaging, with the same bag, same wording on the instructions, same pockets, same accessories, same EVERYTHING...just a different brand name printed on the side! I can't speak yet as to how they will hold up, but I have a feeling all the brands that look similar in pictures are manufactured in the same factories. They just have a different price point.
customer_reviews.author: INGSTL

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast set up for a place place to relax.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my DIL. She loved it. It is super easy to inflate and seal up. She had had another one from a discount store that didn't have the head rest or side pocket. Having the ground stake is great. They were camping and really needed it. She would probably give 5 stars for comfort. I found it comfortable, but as a 70 year old, very hard to get out of. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Air lounger
customer_reviews.text: The lounger was fun to use though there was a learning curve at learning how to inflate. We ran back and forth in our yard trying to expand it- it felt like learning to fly a kite. It was quite comfortable and sturdy. Folding it was a learning curve too but done in a couple minutes. After squeezing all the air out , it fit neatly into the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We're moving to Hawaii, so we have no furniture for a month. We got this both for the beach and for us to have "furniture" for the month we don't have our household goods! It has been great! Once you get the technique down, it's very easy and quick to inflate. It's also very comfortable to lay on. It has a little "pillow" on one end of it that makes lounging comfortable. Our kids haven't been the gentlest to it and it's holding up well! I'm very happy we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: As easy as an easy lounger
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to set up. Does not need strong wind, a mild breeze will fill up the chambers in no time. Our 8 and 10 yo can do it on their own. Very comfortable. Many have fallen asleep on it. Have used it twice outdoors and once at home. At home, we filled it up with a standing tower fan. Our family now owns 3 of this and one more is on its way. I had a minor issue, totally my fault, and it was resolved very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ArtNYC

customer_reviews.title: Family's bestfriend
customer_reviews.text: When I first inflate it I was like meh :/ how can anyone in the reviews like this thing so I let my little one played with it then one day I was watching tv out of curiosity I just lay on it.. Boyyy, this thing is truly comfy and you can easily adjust your body on it.. the head support thingy is a plus. My husband always tease me even my sister that I may popped it and how can it be comfortable🤡.. Well look who's talking now🧐 They both love it. Now we have to fight who gets on it first😝
customer_reviews.author: EdNa_13🌸

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer serive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile ago,but I haven't got a chance to use it. For the first timer, it took me a good 15 minutes to inflate. It won't keep the air in for long, I had to keep inflate every 30 minutes. I don't know if my was leaked or defective. Not happy with my purchase. Updated**** Customer service reached out to me for a replacement. It's working good so far. I guess I got defective on the one
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Quan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase of 2020!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product! After seeing someone using one in a park, we ordered two. Once we figured out how to inflate (took a couple tries to get the knack), it's super easy. So comfortable, so easy to use/carry/store. Has been wonderful to have during quarantine--we lounge in our yard reading & relaxing. Invariably, neighbors stop to ask about them. We absolutely love our Wekapos!
customer_reviews.author: KCHWriter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable lounger for both inside and outside use!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these advertised for awhile now and finally thought I would give them a try! I purchased the black one so I could use it in my not only outside on my patio but also in my basement which matches my furniture. It is relatively easy to inflate if you have a windy day and is very comfortable! Both my daughter and husband love it just as much so every time I go to lounge in it, one of them are usually in it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angie P

customer_reviews.title: great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 5 year old to have fun with - especially outside during BBQs. So far I have not tried to inflate by running around trying to catch air so not sure how easily that will be done. I put it against the AC in the house and it inflated really quickly and once you close the flap it stays inflate pretty well. My son sat on it for about an hour and you can tell slight air loss but not a lot. Overall very satisfied. We'll see how easy it is without the AC
customer_reviews.author: ROMAN M

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this! Unfortunately it was not as easy to inflate as promised. Admittedly there wasn’t a bit of wind but still, even with running it did not adequately fill and we had to roll the end up quite a bit. Even then, when I attempted to lay down my rear-end went straight to the ground. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HAS5280

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Cheap Still Waiting on Refund
customer_reviews.text: Junk, cannot believe I fell for the hype. It's two plastic bags. Worse is the hassle of returning this cheap monstrosity. I returned it 2 weeks ago and still no refund. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Bookish Chic

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping in the clouds on water
customer_reviews.text: Ever slept on a cloud in the water? I think I have...or pretty darn close! On THIS thing! I am obsessed. Super comfy and you get to run around and have a workout to blow it up (or at your house use a fan for the love of gawd). I think everyone should own one and experience their own bouncy piece or heaven. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Crossed

customer_reviews.title: Popped right away
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and already has a hole and it doesn’t hold air anymore. What a bummer..
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated as claimed...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions completely. Item was fully inflated. According to the item description the company claims that the product should remain inflated for at least 5-6 hours. After only 1 hour it needed to be refilled again. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: ghostforza

customer_reviews.title: Do it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the pattern on my air lounger! I was SO excited when it finally came! However, it kept deflating super quickly. I emailed the company and without hesitation, they sent me a brand new one! This one is flawless! I absolutely love it. I struggle with inflating it in the wind, but using a fan is pretty painless! So glad I pulled the trigger. One of my favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ford

product_meta.title: Wekapo Inflatable Lounger Air Sofa Hammock-Portable,Water Proof& Anti-Air Leaking Design-Ideal Couch for Backyard Lakeside Beach Traveling Camping Picnics & Music Festivals
feature_bullets: ✔ EASY INFLATION-No pump required. Just whisk it through the air to inflate. The little trick is that you need to trap air by closing the sleeve opening before the end of each movement, and keep the mouth closed until you begin the next movement.
✔ UNIQUE PILLOW SHAPED HEADREST DESIGN- WEKAPO air lounger has patented pillow shaped headrest design that gives your upper back and neck comfortable support when you need relaxation most.

✔ ANTI-DEFLATION TECHNOLOGY-Our unique patented design together with years of experience of making inflated products make sure that once WEKAPO air lounge is inflated, it will stay inflated for at least 5-6 hours for our dear customers to enjoy.

✔ CARRY BAG, STAKE & OPENER – This lazy lounge also comes with a carry bag to let you store and carry the air sofa conveniently, a stake that can be used with built in security loop to firmly secure the blow up couch in position such that it stays in place even on a windy day, and a BOTTLE OPENER to help you chill anywhere, anytime.

✔ 100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We also offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked. However, we are quite sure that you will be super impressed with this wind bed. WEKAPO brand air lounger with patent is only sold by WEKAPO.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
